description.en: Ubiq is a decentralized platform which allows the creation and implementation of smart contracts and decentralized applications. Built upon an improved Ethereum codebase, the Ubiq blockchain acts as a large globally distributed ledger and supercomputer, allowing developers to create decentralized and automated solutions to thousands of tasks which today are carried out by third party intermediaries.

status_updates.description:
Hello Everyone,

We are proud to announce the formation and launch of UbiqLabs.

UbiqLabs serves to build a stable and dependable #DeFi ecosystem on Ubiq.

Our launch includes a bridge to Ethereum (https://bridge.ubiq.fi), enabling the transfer of Wrapped Ether (wETH) to Ubiq.

Please follow our socials on twitter and discord as we plan to have more updates for you all soon!

https://twitter.com/ubiqlabs

Jaimish Patel - CEO/Founder UbiqLabs

Ubiq is proud to announce the Monoceros Hard Fork and Gubiq 7.0

The Monoceros hark fork activates the final component of UIP-16, setting a base fee per gas floor of 80 gwei. This release also sets the default miner tip to 1 gwei.

This is a MANDATORY HARD FORK update scheduled to activate at block 1,981,337 (currently estimated for February 28, 2022).

https://blog.ubiqsmart.com/announcing-the-monoceros-hard-fork-and-gubiq-7-0-be092f8bfc80

The Next Redeemable ERC1155 Poster5 (the sixth in the series) will drop today, January 26th 10am to 11am PST.

Once again, limited quantity of 88 posters. Same 12inch x 18inch dimensions. This is a great piece that is a futuristic 3D modelled rendering that I think will be really popular and a crowd favorite.

Check out our original blog post on the posters: https://blog.ubiqsmart.com/ubiq-launches-its-first-redeemable-nft-39e70bf1084

Ubiq is proud to announce that Luke Williams (aka iquidus) will be working on Ubiq in a full time capacity for 2022.

Luke has been contributing to the Ubiq network since its inception on a part time basis for 5 years and funding has recently been made available for him to commit to a full time position.

Read more on our blog post:

https://blog.ubiqsmart.com/ubiq-2022-and-beyond-iquidus-joins-ubiq-full-time-d2b49b2b893e

Ubiq is pleased to announce the Orion Hard Fork

Orion will activate at block 1,791,793, currently estimated for January 10, 2022.

This update will activate the following UIPs:

These UIPs are all major changes to the platform, therefore we recommend all our users, miners and community to read through the detailed blog post.

Read more:
blog.ubiqsmart.com/announcing-the-orion-hard-fork-and-gubiq-6-0-30f9265b9b6c

Ubiq is proud to present the launch of GB89

GB89 allows you to mint an ERC721 token of a calculator formula. It all lives on-chain. No IPFS or centralized JPEG hosting required. Your NFT will survive as long as the Ubiq network is alive

The cost to mint is 50 UBQ which gets sent to the Burner address has a total supply of 256

Each GB89 has a randomized attributes for the Background color, Screen color and Body color

Read More: https://blog.ubiqsmart.com/announcing-gb89-fca1a76aa892

Ubiq is proud to present the launch of CHIMP: The On-Chain Image Manipulation Program.

CHIMP allows you to mint an ERC721 token of pixel art that you create. It all lives on-chain. No IPFS or centralized JPEG hosting is require. Your pixel art will survive as long as the Ubiq network is alive.

CHIMP is a 16x16 pixel image constrained to 4 colors for efficient storage.

Read more: https://blog.ubiqsmart.com/announcing-chimp-49eb70f30991

Use CHIMP here: https://chimp.ubiqsmart.com/
